content: designed to cover your head and face this crochet balaclava is a winter must-have offered in sizes for the whole family you can stay warm and protected in style stitched in machine wash and dry red heart super saver you ll work from side to side with single_crochet in the back loop plus short turn row techniques since super saver gives you well over 100 colors to choose from you can crochet a balaclava in everyone s favorite color sizes to fit head circumference child 2/4 years 18½ 47 cm child 6/10 years 19 48 cm adult small 19½ - 20½ 49 5 - 52 cm adult large 21 - 22 53 5 - 56 cm pretty n pink 0722 or turqua 0512 or macaw 3944 sizes 2/4 1 ball 137/125 yds/m 6/10 1 ball 178/163 yds/m small 1 ball 233/213 yds/m large 1 ball 273/250 yds/m
